TopicTitle: Hello there! And a quick question about something strange I've noticed

Articles.Content:
Hey folks! I've been playing KSP for a few weeks now. I didn't know squat about flying or rockets before the game; so not only am I having fun, I feel like I've learned a wee bit of physics along the way. I just completed a recreation of the Gemini 6A/7 missions. I totally failed the first few times but I've finally docked my two ships, twice!

Dude, I have been interplanetary but never made a succesful docking. Haha Welcome to the forums.
